filename: M17 Land Nav Range 28 July CONOP.pptx

sections.MISSION:
Mustang Troop conducts M17/M500 Tables 6 and STX Training IVO RNG 101 NLT 22 2359 JUL2025 IOT qualify all soldiers on weapons in preparation for Saber Junction
M17/500 RNG 122
COMMANDERS
sections.PURPOSE: Prepare Troop for SQD LFX and further collective training
sections.END STATE:
100 Bull Troopers Qualified in M4 and 40 M249, No casualties
TRAINING OBJECTIVES:
Mustang Troopers Qualify for EIB
sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
Planning: LT Smith plan and resources backside support for the range, SGT McMaster
Preparation: On 19NOV RSO back briefs CPT Johnson the training plan during rehearsal and SL’s train the trainer (TL’s) at the range
sections.EXECUTION:
Rifle Teams conduct Table 6 Qual and Advanced Rifle Marksmanship training in accordance with IWTS
Recovery: Participants collect ammo and clean the range. Range is closed out.
sections.TASKS:
TO SUBS:
SGT Garcia creates the training plan for range.
SGT McMaster creates Land Nav South training plan
CORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
